title: If there is no data for series, it should pop up a friendly error message to remind.
OB: When a chart is created and a data definition is set, if a column without data is selected, no error message is displayed.
EB: When a chart is created and a data definition is set, if a column without data is selected, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a chart and set a data definition. 2. Select a column without data.
